member.name: IPreviewHandlerVisuals.SetBackgroundColor
member.summary: Sets the background color of the preview handler.
member.param: A value of type COLORREF to use for the preview handler background.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandlerVisuals.SetFont
member.summary: Sets the font attributes to be used for text within the preview handler.
member.param: A pointer to a LOGFONTW Structure containing the necessary attributes for the font to use.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandlerVisuals.SetTextColor
member.summary: Sets the color of the text within the preview handler.
member.param: A value of type COLORREF to use for the preview handler text color.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandlerVisuals
member.summary: Exposes methods for applying color and font information to preview handlers.
